intro: Brunellia ephemeropetala, commonly known as the ephemeral petal tree, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil, Colombia, and Peru. The plant is characterized by its small, showy flowers that bloom briefly, giving it its common name.
